## FilterSchemaOptions.setTitle property

Set this flag if you want the schema to set generated title property.

By default the setting is enabled. (e.g. {<!-- -->setTitle: true<!-- -->}<!-- -->)

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTitle?: boolean;
```
